SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener
public class VirtualView extends Object implements EventListener
The VirtualView class acts as a bridge between the game model and the client. It listens for game events and sends updates to the client.
